quote right now visa and MasterCard
charge Merchants an egregious 2 to 3%

smaller Merchants are disproportionately

why visa and mastercard's profit margins
are each higher than 50% small
businesses have no choice but to accept
Visa and MasterCard since they control
80% of the credit card Market a stable
coin Network could drop those swipe fees
to essentially zero Merchants hate swipe
fees rightfully so and if they could opt
for a lower fee Network that wouldn't
limit their Tam total addressable Market
they'd switch in a heartbeat end quote
